description.narrative: The overall objective of this project is to improve access to food and livelihood opportunities of conflict affected and vulnerable households in Hajjah and Al-Hudaydah, Yemen. This will be achieved through the provision of food vouchers to 3,043 vulnerable households, coupled with a smaller component of supporting 670 households with previous experience in particular sectors with small business assets, contributing to the restoration of disrupted livelihoods.

title.narrative: Reduced prevalence of households with moderate or severe hunger

description.narrative: Reduced prevalence of households with moderate or severe hunger (target: min. 70% of beneficiary households score 0-1 on the household hunger scale)
